title: Taiwan to join 'democratic countries' in sanctions on Russia
description: Taiwan will join "democratic countries" in imposing sanctions on Russia over the invasion of Ukraine, the government said on Friday, with the world's largest contract chipmaker TSMC saying it would comply with all export control rules.
